'''Pono''' is an unseen character in the [[Season 2|second season]]. He is a [[Dothraki]] [[Khal]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Pono is a ''ko'' in Khal [[Drogo]]'s khalassar. After Drogo's fall from his horse and subsequent incapacitacion, Pono is one the first of several kos that declares himself Khal, taking ten thousand of the khalasar as his own.
